message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fair starting point, and it gives us both a good share of the money.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair deal considering the inflation rate - you'll get 40% of the value, while I get 60%.
Let's split it evenly this time. We both have to account for inflation, and a 50/50 split feels fairer given the circumstances.
